## General info

Users upload recepies, comments and follow other bloggers

## Technologies

Project is created with:

- rails version: 4.2.4

## Setup

To run this project, install it locally using npm:

```
$ cd ../invntory
& bundle install
$ rake db:migrate
$ rails s
```
